It is a professional manufacturer of remote control socket products at home and abroad. results.title: Ningbo Baihuang Electric Appliance Co., LTD
results.content: Ningbo Baihuang Electric Appliance Co., LTD. It is a professional manufacturer of remote control socket series ...
results.raw_content:
Ningbo Baihuang Electric Appliance Co., LTD
Founded in 1996, Baihuang Electric Co., Ltd. is a comprehensive enterprise specializing in R&D, design, production and sales, with a one-stop production line from mold production to injection molding, assembly and finished products. It is a professional manufacturer of remote control socket series products at home and abroad. The company's remote control sockets, smart sockets, induction doorbells, smart lamp holders and intelligent strip series and other products - the products are exported to Hong Kong, Macao, Europe, America and Southeast Asia more than 40 countries and regions, enjoying a good reputation in the industry.
Enterprise spirit
Adhering to the enterprise spirit of "enterprising, self-improvement" and the corporate tenet of "sincerity as the way and benevolence as morality", we pay attention to scientific management, new product development and technical quality improvement. The company's products have obtained GS, CE, RED, ROHS, ETL, FCC and other certifications. We sincerely welcome all walks of life to visit our company for inspection and guidance, and expand the remote control world together.
Enterprise teams
Strong scientific research team, strong brand culture, unified corporate image communication, mature market launch program, rich channel profit return, this is the source of our development——— grow and fly together! With sincerity and wisdom "open wireless life" so that you can "enjoy unlimited space"!

The company is located on the east coast of China,currently boasting 14,000 square meters of factory floor, ranges of advanced production equipment,testing ...
results.raw_content:
About Us
New Products
About Us
Ningbo Haoguang Electric Appliance Co.,Ltd.(Xiangshan Haoguang Electric Wire & Cable Co.,Ltd.) was established in 1994 and was restructured in 1996 to become a company limited by shares.
The company is located on the east coast of China,currently boasting 14,000 square meters of factory floor, ranges of advanced production equipment,testing equipment and other fixed assets and annual production of over hundred million meters of various types of wire and cable products.
Haoguang specialised in manufacturing a variety of UL,CUL,VDE and CCC standard approved wire and cables. Our main products including electronic power lines, lighting wire and cables,leading wires,internal wires of appliances, LSHZ cables,single, multi core cables,silicone rubber cable,all kinds of insulated wire and fire alarm cable.
We have 30 sets of Testing Equipment, 7 wire drawing machines ,8 stranding machines, 9 extruder facility, 2 single stranding machines, 90 braiding machines.
Haoguang cable marketing network all over the world, the products mainly export to America, Europe, southeast Asia and other countries and regions of the world.
Haoguang has a highly qualified team and strict quality inspection of ISO9001 quality management, we put quality,compliance and a strong customer focus at the heart of operations.
Contact Us
Inquiry For Price List
For inquiries about Fire Alarm Cables, Single Core Cables, PVC Cables or pricelist, please leave your email to us and we will be in touch within 24 hours.
Latest News

results.title: NINGBO CIXI BAIHUANG ELECTRIC APPLIANCE CO.,LTD - ExportHub
results.content: Main Products: switch, plugs, doorbell, alarm, lamp holder. Established in 1996, CIXI BAIHUANG ELECTRIC APPLIANCES CO.,LTD is located at the side of Hangzhou Bay, for which the north is the longest bridgeHangzhou Bay across-sea bridge, and the east is one of the biggest portsNingbo port.
results.raw_content:
NINGBO CIXI BAIHUANG ELECTRIC APPLIANCE CO.,LTD
Established in 1996, CIXI BAIHUANG ELECTRIC APPLIANCES CO.,LTD is located at the side of Hangzhou Bay, for which the north is the longest bridgeHangzhou Bay across-sea bridge, and the east is one of the biggest portsNingbo port. There is full of business opportunity for the convenient traffic and geographical predominance. We have a sub-company, KING BAIHUANG ELECTRIC in Jiangsu Province which covers area 35,000 SQ, and an office in Canton.Our company integrates reserch, design, production and sales and we specialize in developing and producing REMOTE CONTROL PRODUCTS: SWITCH SERIES, PLUG SERIES, DOORBELL SERIES AND LAMP HOLDER SERIES: GUARD AGAINST THEFT PRODUCTS: MONITOR SERIES, VIDEO BELL AND ALARM SERIES:SENSOR PRODUCTS: SENSOR SWITCH, SENSOR BELL AND SENSOR LAMP HOLDER: INTELLECTUALIZED PHONE CONTROL: INTERPHONE SYSTEM. For these products, we have already got GS, CE, UL, D, S, LCIE approvals and they are sold to more than sixty counries and regions, such as USA, EEC and Southeast Asia, etc.The company sticks to the human-orientd idea and convince ourselves that making customer satisfied is our pursuing. This unique idea and convction guide us in our routine and our company is gtting larger and larger group.
